page.title: 17SOCIAL CONCERNS EDUCATION
page.content: The economy of the country is in a low state,due to the international trade situation,and some say,to the government's deflationary policies. The result is unemployment and many families have a low income.In addition there are a number of broken families. To help in this situation,there are two benefits administered through the schools. {Free school meals}Subject to an income examination the children of low income families are entitled to free school lunch.In one school 76 children out of a roll of 300 receive free meals. {Clothing and footwear grant} Families receiving supplementary income benefits or family income supplement are entitled to such grants At present they amount to c.Â£30 per annum per child.
